## Checklist for New Features

Does this feature:
- [ ] Respect human checkpoints (doesn't bypass human decisions)
- [ ] Follow VS methodology (provides diverse options, not just common answers)
- [ ] Support both English and Korean
- [ ] Fit within the research lifecycle context
